gstat.util

Class Hand<C extends Card>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gstat.util.Hand<C>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackJackHand

    public class Hand<C extends Card>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is meant to be extended by a player class and can use this class to keep a hand of cards.
    Author:
    Camden Voigt
